subject: Adobe Photoshop CS3 ready to download
body:
Every artist was first an amateur.
When you see a rattlesnake poised to strike you, do not wait until he has struck before you crush him.
Managing is getting paid for home runs someone else hits.
Every great work of art has two faces, one toward its own time and one toward the future, toward eternity.
Nothing leads to good that is not natural.
Things were bad but now they are OK.
Every uneducated person is a caricature of himself.
Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
Easy DOESN'T do it.
We should be as careful of the books we read, as of the company we keep. The dead very often have more power than the living.
Hit em where they ain't.
She has lost the art of conversation, but not, unfortunately, the power of speech.
Were we as eloquent as angels we still would please people much more by listening rather than talking.
We didn't actually overspend our budget.  The health Commission allocation simply fell short of our expenditure.
How inimitably graceful children are in general before they learn to dance!
Actions lie louder than words.
Why so large a cost, having so short a lease, does thou upon your fading mansion spend?
An artist is a creature driven by demons. He doesn't know why they choose him and he's usually too busy to wonder why.
Here lies an Atheist: All Dressed Up and No Place to Go.
